refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_get_current_cipher() returns a pointer to an SSL_CIPHER object containing the description of the actually used cipher of a connection established with the ssl object. See SSL_CIPHER_get_name 3 for more details.

SSL_get_cipher_name() obtains the name of the currently used cipher. SSL_get_cipher() is identical to SSL_get_cipher_name(). SSL_get_cipher_bits() is a macro to obtain the number of secret/algorithm bits used and SSL_get_cipher_version() returns the protocol name.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: SSL_get_current_cipher() returns the cipher actually used, or NULL if no session has been established.
